Key Match Events: Daniel Gafford exited Monday's game against the Memphis Grizzlies in visible pain after sustaining an ankle injury in the second quarter.
Gafford finished with five points on 2-of-3 shooting from the field, along with one rebound and one block before his injury.
Post-Match Reflections: Dallas Mavericks coach Jason Kidd addressed Kyrie Irving's latest injury setback, stating that he would need a couple of days before providing further comments on Irving's condition.
